Perpector:


Perceptor looked at Battera left the medic lab and said "AHHHHH, 
Battera, it's nice to see you here... what do you need? are you lost?"





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Battera::
> 
> She went walking down the halls around the base.  She located the 
> engineering section, the prisoner holding cells, the main 
ventilation 
> supply systems, lab and hanger bays.  She was just wondering 
around, 
> looking rather lost and not sure of where to go.  She eventually 
> found the Med bays and went to the console.  She looked around 
first 
> to make sure that no one was looking. Then, she opened up the 
console 
> pad and started to look for info on the bot Nightlight.
> 
> She soon found what she was looking for. THe original bot known as 
> nightlight had been here. Was reprogrammed and into another bot. 
She 
> was about to find the name when she heard a noise. She closed out 
the 
> computer terminal and made a rather loud sigh. "Drat. I try to find 
> the map to find my way around and this stupid computer won't help 
me. 
> All it does is bring up medical stuff to which I know nothing 
about. 
> By the PIT won't this bad day just end already."  She whined a 
little 
> and turned to leave. Her head low and her shoulders drooping a bit, 
> just incase someone was watching.
